mapper.select: SELECT `role`.* FROM sys_user AS `user`, sys_user_role AS ur, sys_role AS `role` WHERE ur.user_id = `user`.id AND ur.role_id = `role`.id AND `user`.id = #{id}
SELECT `menu`.id FROM sys_role `role`, sys_role_menu srm, sys_menu `menu` WHERE `role`.id = srm.role_id AND srm.menu_id = `menu`.id AND `role`.id = #{id}
